boat.construction_details: Hull GRP, Deck, cockpit and coachhouse marine ply.

for_sales.sales_text:
"North Star" is a fiberglass 1978 long keeled, encapsulated ballast, gaff rigged Tamarisk 24. Extensively cruised and well cared for. She is a real head-turner and receives much attention wherever she goes. More importantly, she is in sound seaworthy condition. She is well equipped and ready for extended cruising, crewed or singlehanded. 

She is now indoors in her winter storage and available for inspection. She is located a short drive from Kerry Airport in southwest Ireland which has twice daily connecting flights to London. 

She can be loaded on a truck or launched from her current location. 

To see videos visit my YouTube channel. More photos and info. available on request.

boat.full_description:
North Star is a fiberglass Tamarisk 24 designed by David Cannell based on the Itchen Ferry designs.

A previous owner was a member of the Irish Cruising Club and had articles on his cruising published in the club's journal.

To see videos of the boat visit Ivan’s YouTube channel.
boat.name: North Star
boat.short_description: 'North Star' is a fine example of Tamarisk 24, built in 1978.
